messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] balancing unschooling time
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 7/20/00 7:29:21 AM Central Daylight Time, oilmagic@up.net writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 7/20/00 7:29:21 AM Central Daylight Time, oilmagic@...
writes:

<< How do folks balance time for un-schooling? Do you block out time or let
it happen when it happens or a mixture of both?
>>
Probably many types of ideas could be given here... In my family, I find a
mixture of me encouraging, and initiating on some days, and on others , the
kids initiate. Some days seem slower, then there are days, like yesterday,
where my oldest son was brimming with ideas. He was building tunnels and
towers and watching how a ball would roll through, made a bowling game,
wanted to make and play with playdough, etc...So, for us, each day can be a
little different from the day before, but it works for us. ~Karen
